fields.name: Rifle
fields.definition: A long-barreled firearm designed for accurate shooting

fields.name: Sword
fields.definition: A bladed weapon with a long metal blade and a handle

fields.name: Club
fields.definition: A heavy stick or similar weapon used for striking

fields.name: Knife
fields.definition: A short-bladed cutting tool or weapon

fields.name: Mace
fields.definition: A heavy club with a metal head

fields.name: Musket
fields.definition: A smoothbore long gun used in the 16th to 19th centuries

fields.name: Dagger
fields.definition: A short knife with a pointed blade

fields.name: Staff
fields.definition: A long stick used as a weapon

fields.name: Bow
fields.definition: A ranged weapon that fires arrows
